00029 #include "StochasticDurationCellCycleModel.hpp"
00030 #include "Exception.hpp"
00031 
00032 StochasticDurationCellCycleModel::StochasticDurationCellCycleModel()
00033     :AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel()
00034 {
00035 }
00036 
00037 AbstractCellCycleModel* StochasticDurationCellCycleModel::CreateCellCycleModel()
00038 {
00039     // Create a new cell-cycle model
00040     StochasticDurationCellCycleModel* p_model = new StochasticDurationCellCycleModel();
00041 
00042     /*
00043      * Set each member variable of the new cell-cycle model that inherits
00044      * its value from the parent.
00045      *
00046      * Note 1: some of the new cell-cycle model's member variables (namely
00047      * mBirthTime, mCurrentCellCyclePhase, mReadyToDivide) will already have been
00048      * correctly initialized in its constructor.
00049      *
00050      * Note 2: one or more of the new cell-cycle model's member variables
00051      * may be set/overwritten as soon as InitialiseDaughterCell() is called on
00052      * the new cell-cycle model.
00053      *
00054      * Note 3: the member variable mDimension remains unset, since this cell-cycle
00055      * model does not need to know the spatial dimension, so if we were to call
00056      * SetDimension() on the new cell-cycle model an exception would be triggered;
00057      * hence we do not set this member variable.
00058      */
00059     p_model->SetBirthTime(mBirthTime);
00060     p_model->SetCellProliferativeType(mCellProliferativeType);
00061     p_model->SetMinimumGapDuration(mMinimumGapDuration);
00062     p_model->SetStemCellG1Duration(mStemCellG1Duration);
00063     p_model->SetTransitCellG1Duration(mTransitCellG1Duration);
00064     p_model->SetSDuration(mSDuration);
00065     p_model->SetG2Duration(mG2Duration);
00066     p_model->SetMDuration(mMDuration);
00067 
00068     return p_model;
00069 }
00070 
00071 void StochasticDurationCellCycleModel::SetG1Duration()
00072 {
00073     RandomNumberGenerator* p_gen = RandomNumberGenerator::Instance();
00074 
00075     switch (mCellProliferativeType)
00076     {
00077         case STEM:
00078             mG1Duration = GetStemCellG1Duration() + 2*p_gen->ranf(); // U[0,2]
00079             break;
00080         case TRANSIT:
00081             mG1Duration = GetTransitCellG1Duration() + 2*p_gen->ranf(); // U[0,2]
00082             break;
00083         case DIFFERENTIATED:
00084             mG1Duration = DBL_MAX;
00085             break;
00086         default:
00087             NEVER_REACHED;
00088     }
00089 }
00090 
00091 
00092 void StochasticDurationCellCycleModel::OutputCellCycleModelParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile)
00093 {
00094     // No new parameters to output
00095 
00096     // Call method on direct parent class
00097     AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel::OutputCellCycleModelParameters(rParamsFile);
00098 }
